kappa_sigma_average( Expr, double kappa, [T nan,] double mean [, double sigma] )
Statistical Functions for MArrays and Expressions | Kappa-Sigma Clipping

Functions

template<class Expr , int N>
int ltl::kappa_sigma_average (const ExprBase< Expr, N > &a, const double kappa, double *const mean, double *const sigma=NULL)
 
template<class Expr , int N>
int ltl::kappa_sigma_average (const ExprBase< Expr, N > &a, const double kappa, const typename Expr::value_type nan, double *const mean, double *const sigma=NULL)
 

Detailed Description

Return number of elements after clipping and store clipped mean (and optionally resulting sigma) to pointed address, also optionally neglecting values == nan.
